channel.title: Automation on Joost Plattel
channel.description: Recent content in Automation on Joost Plattel

item.title: My daily journaling scripts for Obsidian
item.description:
Since I’m quite a heavy user of Obsidian I’d like to share some of my scripts I’ve written for it. Please note that all of the scripts make use of Keyboard Meastro as a way to activate them and some of them use javascript automation within Mac OS X. So it’s Apple only for now.

Within Obsidian I’m keeping a folder in which there are files that are used as a templates. Whether that is the daily note or some other template I often use. Keyboad Meastro just reads these files and paste the contents right at the cursor when I type a certain string.
